titles.title: Food Date Labeling Act of 2021
Food Date Labeling Act of 2021
To establish requirements for quality and discard dates that are, at the option of food labelers, included in food packaging, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Food Date Labeling Act of 2021
This bill addresses food waste by establishing requirements to standardize the quality date and discard date labels on food packaging.
